title: Who is...The Mole ?
content:
Most of you are probably well aware of the popular reality tv show "The Mole" where contestants battle against eachother in mind games and activities, however one of those contestants (the mole) is sabotaging their chances of suceeding in these activities, thus loosing money.

This show is shown in Australia on channel 7 at 7:30PM every Thursday.

The contestants so far are...


[img]http://themole.com.au/images/contestants/brett.gif[/img]

[img]http://themole.com.au/images/contestants/craig.gif[/img]

[img]http://themole.com.au/images/contestants/heidi.gif[/img]

[img]http://themole.com.au/images/contestants/john.gif[/img]

[img]http://themole.com.au/images/contestants/juan.gif[/img]

[img]http://themole.com.au/images/contestants/kristy.gif[/img]

[img]http://themole.com.au/images/contestants/liane.gif[/img]

[img]http://themole.com.au/images/contestants/liz.gif[/img]

[img]http://themole.com.au/images/contestants/mark.gif[/img]

[img]http://themole.com.au/images/contestants/nat.gif[/img]

[img]http://themole.com.au/images/contestants/sonya.gif[/img]

Because there are only 5 choises in the poll i have them grouped.---------
[img]http://img250.echo.cx/img250/9885/comicstrip9vf.gif[/img]

title: Re: Who is...The Mole ?
content:
The name and concept sound vaguely familiar, but it's not on TV over here.
If it's just Australia, I wonder how many people did see the show, because I think I remember the people here come from all over the globe.Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: Who is...The Mole ?
content:
I think it's John. You never know what that mustache could be hiding. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img]

I've never seen this show, but I'm not hugely into reality TV anyway. There's enough of it on TV anyway, without more being pumped in. I mean, there's now a reality TV show about making reality TV shows! title: Re: Who is...The Mole ?
content: I loved the Mole when it was on here. I wish there were more versions of it, but ABC only made 2 (and then 2 celebrity versions, but they weren't quite the same).[url=http://www.screenhog.com]www.screenhog.com[/url]
